question: Will China win Gold in the Women’s 4x200m Freestyle Relay at the 2024 Summer Olympics?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if China wins a Gold medal in the Women’s 4x200m Freestyle Relay at the 2024 Summer Olympics. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If this team is eliminated from contention for a Gold medal in this event based on the official rules of the Olympics, this market will resolve to “No”.

In case of a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the tied team representing USA. If no tied team represents USA, this market will resolve in favor of the team whose country comes first in alphabetical order.

The resolution source will be the first official results published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC).

question: 2024 August hottest on record?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the data for the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for August 2024 shows an increase greater than that of any prior August when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

At the point the data for August 2024 is first released, it will be compared to all previous data points for August, and if 2024 August is higher than all previous data points, this market will resolve to "Yes".

Note: If 2024 August is tied for highest with another year, it will NOT suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" - it must be higher.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figures found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "Aug" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for August 2024 is provided by NASA by December 1, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, a consensus of credible sources will be used to resolve this market.

question: Israel military action against Iran in August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel initiates a military action on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory or against any Iranian embassies or consulates between Aug 1, 12:00 AM ET, and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Israel on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Iranian soil is hit by an Israeli missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Israeli government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

question: Will Kamala say "Brat" in August?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris mentions the word "Brat" between August 1, 4:00 PM ET and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word "Brat" which is recorded (audio or video) and publicly accessible.
-Any written usage of the word "Brat" published through Kamala's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@KamalaHarris and @VP, would qualify however @KamalaHQ will not count).

Videos posted on her social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

events.title: What will Kamala Harris say in August?
events.description: This is a market on predicting what Kamala Harris will say in August.

question: Donald & Melania Trump seen together in August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump and Melania Trump are photographed or videotaped together, in the same frame, between August 1, 5:00 PM ET and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" the images or video must be taken and released within this market's timeframe. The images or video must be authentic, not the result of artificial intelligence or video editing.

The resolution source for this market will be the images or video of Donald and Melania Trump.

question: Ukraine election scheduled in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the next Ukrainian presidential election is scheduled in 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market is about whether a date for the next Ukrainian election is announced between July 31 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Whether the election is supposed to take place in 2024 or later will have no effect on the resolution to this market.

The primary resolution source for this market is official information from the Government of Ukraine however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Trump say "mixed-race" in August?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Donald Trump mentions the word "mixed race" between August 1, 5:45 PM ET and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Trump must say "mixed race" exactly for the mention to count toward this market's resolution (e.g. if Trump says "mixed" referring to someone's ancestry but it is not "mixed race", it will not count toward this market's resolution).

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word which is recorded (audio or video) and publicly accessible.
-Any written usage of the word published through Trump's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization. 

Videos posted on his social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.
